document.full_text: the greek government warned dissenters in the ruling party on wednesday against rejecting an austerity plan agreed under a new international bailout deal, after data showed the depth of the nation's economic crisis.
document.title: greece warns dissenters against rejecting austerity
lines_and_colors: the greek government warned dissenters in the ruling party on wednesday against rejecting an austerity plan agreed under a new international bailout deal, after data showed the depth of the nation's economic crisis.
